UN officially declares famine in Gaza
description: A UN-backed report has confirmed that there is widespread famine in Gaza, the first time a famine has been declared in the Middle East. Israel immediately rejected the findings.

French streamer's death not due to blow inflicted by another as the investigation continues
description: The autopsy of the 46-year-old, who died during a livestream on August 18, found no 'traumatic injuries,' according to the Nice prosecutor. Investigators are considering whether he may have been the victim of undue influence or abuse of weakness.

headline: Israel vows to raze Gaza City if Hamas does not agree to disarm and free hostages
description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says that the government has approved plans for a new assault on Gaza's capital, after more than 100 international aid organizations warned that Israel's siege has led to mass starvation in the enclave.

headline: How the 2024 Olympics transformed Greater Paris into a supersized stadium
description: Previously unpublished data on visitor numbers in Paris and its suburbs during the 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games reveal how the city and its residents adapted, and how the Games accelerated Paris's transformation.

headline: The books we accumulate but will never read are 'less a burden than a form of wealth'
description: 'Letters from America' (5/6). Writer and journalist Thomas Chatterton Williams sees beauty in accumulating thousands of books in his library, knowing that a single lifetime would never be enough to read them all – a beauty found in an unexplored world.

In the Donbas, a Ukrainian high schooler's rebellion against Russification
description: At her Russian-controlled high school near Luhansk, a pro-Ukrainian teenager who resisted propaganda was the target of relentless disciplinary action since January. Fearing that she could be placed in foster care or even adopted, her mother decided to flee the occupied territory.

headline: Why heat and drought are making trees look like autumn is coming early
description: In some regions, drought combined with extreme heat has led to defoliation, a phenomenon that, if recurring, can cause forest dieback.

headline: What is Kick, the platform on which a French streamer died live?
description: Raphaël Grave, known online as Jean Pormanove, died Monday during a livestream. The tragedy has shed light on a little-known streaming site and its extremely permissive moderation policies.
